alert.note: Alert for Prince William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 6:54PM EST until January 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Virginia, including the following county, Prince William. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Fleetwood Road is likely flooded near Cedar Run. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 651 PM EST, Cedar Run at Aden remains in Minor flood stage. The current level is 10.6 feet. It may take several more hours to drop below Minor flood stage (10 feet). - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nokesville... Aden... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
